name: Unstabtower
description:
Climb up the crumbling tower and face platforming challenges! Make sure not to drown or get hit by the hazards! 

Made in 48 Hours for LD49 (You might've knew that already)

Have fun and make sure to rate! I'll try and rate yours :) <3

Unstabtower | ldjam.com | Ludum Dare game jam
